description:
Blurring the line between pack and suitcase, the Tribute is a no-compromise solution for travellers. A wishbone wire frame transfers weight efficiently to your hips, and makes it versatile enough for trails and all-day exploring. A travel cover fully encloses the pack and suspension system, but has a zipper – with lockable pulls – for access to the straps. At 55L, it's a convenient size for extended get-aways when you want one bag to adapt to the situation.

  • Made of 210-denier nylon with a water-resistant polyester lining
  • Lightweight perimeter wishbone frame distributes weight evenly to hips
  • Perforated foam with moisture-wicking mesh on body contact points for cooling
  • Foam padding on the exterior protects your pack in transport
  • When the zip-off daypack is removed, the base is carry-on sized for most airlines
  • All-round zip opens up entirely like a suitcase
  • Zippered, odour-resistant, waterproof compartment for dirty shoes or wet clothing
  • Top zippered pocket for essentials
  • Waterproof, seam-taped travel cover keeps your stuff dry and protected
  • Internal zippered quick-access security pocket
  • Padded handles on three sides,
  • Integrated safety whistle on sternum strap
  • Ergonomically shaped zipper pulls
  • Max recommended load is 20.5kg
name: Gregory Tribute 55L Travel Pack - Women's
